content: this shawl pattern is perfect for adventurous beginner knitters who want to try out some new stitches and advance their knitting skills the shawl starts with a basic garter tab cast on and then work forward using increasingly complex stitches i worked the sample shawl in 3 colours but you can use as many colours as you like diving into your stash finished dimensions after blocking wingspan = 67 170 cm depth = 28 71 cm if you would like a larger shawl i suggest using a heavier dk weight yarn and 4mm us 6 needle
